teghanelizabeth: It's crazy how much I can relate to what you're going through right now. I even got a happy little manicure last week, mine is chubby lil ☁️'s. Struggling with severe depression and anxiety is hard enough, so adding heartbreak on top is just the shits. My motto through this past year has been to take everything 10 seconds at a time (yes I stole that after I binge watched Kimmy Schmidt on Netflix). It's not like I sit around being self soothing and counting to 10, but when you suffer from massive anxiety, the idea of allowing yourself the space to handle only the littlest bit at a time, does feel better. I tell myself - "ok girl. You don't need to think about anything further than 10 seconds from now. Shhhh it's okay 💘 you good. You poppin." Sending you so much support, and so much genuine thanks for sharing your feels. It helps me more than you know 😘
